data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shattuck, Steve, Cover, Stefan (2016): Taxonomy of some little-understood North American ants (Hymenoptera: Formicidae). Zootaxa 4175 (1): 10-22, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4175.1.2|68 occurrences
